text: What is CleverBooks? CleverBooks is an EdTech company that develops augmented reality (AR) educational tools to make learning interactive, interesting, and visual. They create applications and resources that allow students to explore subjects like geography, geometry, and space in three dimensions, making abstract concepts clearer.
title: About CleverBooks

text: What makes CleverBooks different from other EdTech solutions? CleverBooks stands out from many EdTech tools by using augmented reality (AR) to overlay interactive 3D models onto the real world through tablets or smartphones. This allows students to rotate, zoom, and engage with digital models, improving their understanding of the subject matter. Unlike other technologies that require expensive hardware, CleverBooks only needs standard tablets or smartphones. Additionally, the lessons are aligned with global curricula, making them easy to incorporate into classroom teaching. The platform is designed to engage visual, auditory, and kinesthetic learners, ensuring that every user can thrive.
title: About CleverBooks

text: Who is CleverBooks for—teachers, schools, students, or homeschoolers? CleverBooks is designed for everyone. It is ideal for teachers and schools, as it supports classroom teaching, group activities, and STEM lessons. Additionally, when students use CleverBooks, they engage with lessons in a fun and interactive way. CleverBooks tools are also suitable for parents who are teaching at home.
title: About CleverBooks

text: What school grades or age groups are CleverBooks products suitable for? CleverBooks focuses on primary and elementary education for children aged 5 to 12. Their apps and materials are designed to be appropriate and visually engaging for young learners.
title: About CleverBooks

text: Is CleverBooks aligned with specific national or international curricula? CleverBooks claims its content aligns with global education standards, making it suitable for different curricula worldwide. It is designed to be broadly compatible internationally.
title: About CleverBooks

text: What subjects does CleverBooks cover? Geography: AR maps, continents, countries, and flags. Geometry: 3D shapes and properties of solids. Space: Planets, the solar system, and space exploration. STEM skills: mental mapping, problem-solving, and critical thinking.
title: About CleverBooks

text: Where can I find sample lesson plans or teaching guides? Free resources for sample lesson plans and teacher materials are available on CleverBooks. These resources are often available as PDFs or downloadable guides for each augmented reality (AR) app. You can access them under the individual product pages on the website, or you can contact CleverBooks directly for specific materials.
title: About CleverBooks

text: Is CleverBooks research-backed or evidence-based? CleverBooks highlights research showing that augmented reality (AR) improves student concentration, motivation, and spatial skills. They have received endorsements from educators and EdTech communities in over 40 countries. Additionally, they engage in research collaborations.
title: About CleverBooks

text: How is CleverBooks being used in real classrooms? In actual classrooms, we can develop interactive geography lessons that enable students to scan augmented reality (AR) maps, allowing them to explore countries, flags, and fascinating facts. Furthermore, we can conduct 3D geometry lessons that provide students with the opportunity to experience solid shapes in three dimensions, as opposed to merely viewing flat images in their textbooks. Teachers use CleverBooks as a digital tool to support active learning. During the COVID-19 pandemic, they used augmented reality to engage students while teaching remotely.
title: About CleverBooks

text: Are CleverBooks products suitable for special education needs? Visual and interactive formats can significantly benefit students with learning differences, and augmented reality (AR) can adjust the scope of learning styles. However, CleverBooks does not specifically market its products for special education. They do not make targeted claims regarding conditions such as autism or dyslexia. Although these tools may be advantageous for students with special educational needs (SEN), teachers need to set each tool on an individual basis to decide its relevance to their specific classroom requirements.
title: About CleverBooks

text: Is there teacher training available? CleverBooks offers a range of training sessions for educators, including both free and paid options, to help them effectively integrate augmented reality (AR) into their teaching. The sessions cover the utilization of AR apps, aligning AR content with educational curricula, and best practices for implementation in the classroom. To request training, please visit the Contact page on the website.
title: About CleverBooks

text: Where can I find lesson plans? On the CleverBooks website, you can find free resources under the Free Resources section (it seems like the section existed, but when I open the page, it shows a 404 error), within individual product pages, or by directly asking. Teachers can email CleverBooks to request tailored lesson ideas.
title: About CleverBooks

text: What is curriculum alignment? It involves ensuring that teaching materials are aligned with the educational standards that students are expected to meet, such as Common Core, national curricula, or IB frameworks. CleverBooks aligns its content with global learning objectives, allowing teachers to effortlessly integrate AR tools into their existing lessons without straying off-topic.
title: About CleverBooks

The app is designed to be interactive and engaging, making geography learning fun and accessible for both classroom and home use.

The app also includes interactive weather and seasonal simulations, as well as engaging activities like feeding animals in "Animal Mode".

By overlaying 3D models of countries, geographical features, and other elements onto the real world through a mobile device, the app creates an immersive and interactive learning experience. text: AR not working properly. Ensure: 1. Camera permissions are granted to the app. 2. Good lighting conditions. 3. The physical marker/workbook is undamaged and properly positioned. 4. Your device's camera is clean and functional. 5. You're using the correct marker for the app. 6. Try recalibrating or restarting the app.
title: Support and Troubleshooting

text: Login or account issues. If you're having trouble logging in: 1. Check your internet connection. 2. Verify your username and password. 3. Use the "Forgot Password" feature if needed. 4. Ensure your subscription is active. 5. Contact support with your account details if problems continue.
title: Support and Troubleshooting

text: Sound or voiceover not working. Check: 1. Device volume is turned up and not muted. 2. The app has audio permissions. 3. In-app sound settings are enabled. 4. Try using headphones to isolate the issue. 5. Restart the app and device.
title: Support and Troubleshooting

text: Can’t see other users in multi-user mode. For multi-user issues: 1. Ensure all users are on the same session code. 2. Check internet connectivity for all devices. 3. Verify that multi-user features are included in your subscription. 4. Restart the session. 5. Contact support if the problem persists.
title: Support and Troubleshooting

text: How do I request a feature? To suggest a new feature or improvement: 1. Email your ideas to support@cleverbooks.com. 2. Use the feedback form on the CleverBooks website. 3. Participate in user surveys or community forums if available.
